page.title: 05Children's Leisure Survey
page.content: We made a survey of what we do in our leisure time.46% of us go to 4 0 clock club.20% go to watch football(usually Watford)but only one person goes to see rugby. Most people who go to music lessons play the piano. One person goes to gymnastics,only two people go to dancing lessons,one goes to ballet and one to disco.Two people go to football lessons. {26% of the juniors watch over 4 hours {of television}every day,but 11% watch none.Most people watch TV or video in the evenings.36% of children play in the park and 11% play inside.62% of children in the school help with washing or drying up.2% of children empty bins. 2% of children do photography and 36% collect things.
